articles.author: DAVID KOENIG AP Airlines Writer
articles.title: American Airlines sues a travel site to crack down on consumers who use this trick to save money - ABC News
articles.description: American Airlines is trying to crack down on a travel hack
articles.content:
DALLAS -- American Airlines is suing a travel website that sells tickets that let people save money by exploiting a quirk in airline pricing.

articles.title: American referee Tori Penso picked by FIFA for England-Spain final at Women's World Cup - ABC News
articles.description: American referee Tori Penso has been picked by FIFA for the Women’s World Cup final between Spain and England
articles.content:
SYDNEY -- American referee Tori Penso was picked Friday by FIFA for the Womens World Cup final between Spain and England to complete a rare double after also working one of the semifinals.
